title: Question:
author: Loco1887
content: Most people are complaining right now about LUNA, losses in general etc.Lets talk about the future, because every bear market offers chances.Which cryptocurrencies have the best fundamentals and will recover fast after bear market ended?You can vote twice!

comments.author: StarKay
comments.body: My two top choice are missing from your list of options, the last time I checked Ethereum and BNB are the top two Altcoins without including stable coins.Ethereum and BNB definitely have most chances to come out stronger because of the level of adoption and trust.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: My two top choice are missing from your list of options too.Even before the current stagnation of the market, I was and still support the Ethereum network as one of the largest projects with promising prospects.Also, Binance is one of the most promising projects for me.

comments.author: uneng
comments.body: Main altcoins will come stronger after the currently bear market, as soon as a new bull run starts lead by bitcoin's leadership, as it has already happened in the past. Besides the obvious altcoins, I expect BAT and native tokens from investment platforms like Nexo, Crypto.com and Celsius (if Celsius overcomes the reliability issue with customers regards the recent rumours of funds not being safe and delays on withdrawls which caused the CEL token to crash beyond the normal bear market fluctuations and the platform to lose more than 1$ billion dollars in cashouts).

comments.author: goinmerry
comments.body: Almost all altcoins listed do have potential. Expect that those coins will be carried once Bitcoin gains its momentum on the road on another bullish trend.However, our decision should only be decided by ourselves. It's risky to follow others' advice but nothing wrong to refer to those. There's no such thing that we can predict what will happen next that's why even putting money on a coin with potential and real fundamentals, we don't know what will happen next.Buy the dip, buy a much more dip, buy a more dip, dip, dip, let's be careful deciding when to make another entry.

comments.author: Smack That Ace
comments.body: It is difficult to say which coin will be strong when the bear market is over, after each long bear cycle there will be a lot of changes. Some will continue and some will not be able to make it through the long bear season, not to mention the market is always evolving and there will be a lot of new projects coming out to compete. Best to hold bitcoin and ethereum can add BNB because over time only ethereum is the only altcoin that can stand and grow, bnb is probably the new alt like the others but with the support of the binance exchange, I don't think it will be phased out any time soon.
